full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SGROL DKAR DANG TSE DPAG MED KYI TSE SGRUB NGAG 'DON 'KHYER BDE BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING GI TSOGS CHEN DG BSKOS DKA' BCU SHES RAB CHOS 'BYOR DANG, DBU MDZAD RAB 'BYAMS PA TSUL KHRIMS BZANG PO GNYIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG SOGS KYI RIM GROR PHRAL DU TSE SGRUB DGOS SKABS TSOGS PA'I ZHAL 'DON DU 'DI 'DRA DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, ^ DHARMA BADZRA GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS SO,, ,,DGE LDAN BSTAN PA'I RING LUGS DRI MA MED, ,PHYOGS BCUR DAR ZHING RGYAS PA'I CHOS GRVA 'DIR, ,CHOS SBYIN SPEL PHYIR CHOS 'DI DPAR DU SGRUBS, ,DGE BA'I 'GRO KUN BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,)
